about.p1: Hello, my name is Nikos Papapetrou. I was born in Olympiada, Kozani. I am a graduate of History from the University of Ioannina. This is my blog where you can read articles about history, as well as current affairs.
about.p2: My other interests include landscape photography.

titles.t4: How do we use your information?
titles.t5: Do we share your information with anyone?

paragraphs.general: The purpose of this privacy policy is to inform the visitors of the website about the information that is collected and how it is used.
paragraphs.p1: We collect non-personal information about your visit to our website blog, such as your IP address, browser type, and operating system. We also collect information about how you use our website blog, such as the pages you visit and the links you click.
paragraphs.p2: We use the information we collect to improve our website blog and to provide you with a better user experience. For example, we use your IP address to determine your location so that we can show you relevant content. We also use your browser type and operating system to ensure that our website blog is compatible with your devices.
paragraphs.p3: We do not share your personal information with anyone. We use Matomo Analytics to track website traffic, but Matomo Analytics is compliant with GDPR and does not store cookies.
paragraphs.p4: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. If we make any changes, we will post the updated privacy policy on our website blog.
paragraphs.p5: If you have any questions about the website's privacy policy, please do not hesitate to contact the website administrator.
